metadata.title: CVE-2023-46838 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Transmit requests in Xen's virtual network protocol can consist of multipleparts. While not really useful, except for the initial part any of them maybe of zero length, i.e. carry no data at all. Besides a certain initialportion of the to be transferred data, these parts are directly translatedinto what Linux calls SKB fragments. Such converted request parts can, whenfor a particular SKB they are all of length zero, lead to a de-reference ofNULL in core networking code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-27-generic - 6.5.0-27.28
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-27-generic - 6.5.0-27.28
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-27-generic-64k - 6.5.0-27.28
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1017-aws - 6.5.0-1017.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1018-azure - 6.5.0-1018.19
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1017-gcp - 6.5.0-1017.17
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1013-laptop - 6.5.0-1013.16
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-27-lowlatency - 6.5.0-27.28.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-27-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-27.28.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1020-oracle - 6.5.0-1020.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1020-oracle-64k - 6.5.0-1020.20
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1011-starfive - 6.5.0-1011.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-27.28').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1017.17').
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1018.19').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1017.17').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1013.16').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-27.28.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1020.20').
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1011.12').
